mdRecord.dcterms:title: A splendid horse, Star of the South: He was sired by "Star of the West" the best bred horse in my opinion, that the world ever saw. .. He will stand at [blank]. He will be let to mares at $10, if paid in the season, otherwise $12 / By the Agent for C.R. Fontaine
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fontaine, C. R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The season will terminate the 1st July, and perhaps a Fall season will commence the 1st August with him and Star of the East, in this or some other section of the country."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Transferred from Papers of the Cocke family, MSS 640 & 1480, Folder 11. Photographic negative, 35-197-F.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Star of the South (Horse)
Horses--Breeding.
Stallions--Virginia.
